Title: RezRight
DescriptionArr: A web app that makes the process of creating a resume as easy as possible.
RezRight was built using React for the front-end and Express.js with MongoDB for the back-end server and database.
Span: Developed on a team of four and deployed within 4 weeks.
Contributions: Individually contributed React structure, data structure storage development, front-end data flow.

Title: Cloud Chart
DescriptionArr: Cloud Chart is a spreadsheet-database hybrid, Spreadsheets are saved to a SQL database with cross referenced fields.
Cloud Chart was built using React for the front-end, Java with Spring Boot for the back-end and MySQL for the database.
Span: Developed on a team of 3 and deployed within 1 week.
Contributions: Individually contributed React structure, front-end data flow and configured client RESTful endpoints.

Title: WoW Bindings
DescriptionArr: A web app that allows you to test your World of Warcraft keybindings and trains your muscle memory for quick reactions.
Span: Built as a solo personal project using React for the front-end and draws from Google Sheets for the database used along with local storage.
